ca.eandb.jmist.framework

Interface LinearTransformable3

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Rotatable3
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AffineTransformable3
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AffineTransformation3, InvertibleAffineTransformation3, MeshBuilder, TransformableGeometry, TransformableLens, TransformableSceneElement

    public interface LinearTransformable3
extends Rotatable3
    Represents a three dimensional object to which linear transformations can be applied.
    Author:
    Brad Kimmel

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void transform(LinearMatrix3 T)
      Transforms this object according to the specified linear transformation.
